metadata.summary: Execute Google Cloud Platform gcloud CLI commands directly from LimaCharlie using the Cloud CLI Extension with service account authentication.
metadata.primary_use_case: Manage Google Cloud resources and services from LimaCharlie detection and response rules

extracted_apis.description: Stop a GCP compute instance using gcloud CLI through the Cloud CLI extension
Execute gcloud commands via LimaCharlie extension with cloud='gcloud', command_tokens array, and credentials
